paper_abstract: We prove a monotonicity condition satisfied by the Erlang C formula when computed in the Halfin-Whitt regime. This property was recently conjectured in (Janssen et al., Queueing Syst. Theory Appl. 68:361-363, 2011).
paper_title: A short note on the monotonicity of the Erlang C formula in the Halfin-Whitt regime
